verse:
तपःप्रभावाद्देवप्रसादाच्च ब्रह्म ह श्वेताश्वतरोऽथ विद्वान्।
अत्याश्रमिभ्यः परमं पवित्रं प्रोवाच सम्यगृषिसङ्घजुष्टम्॥

terms.तपःप्रभावात्: Due to the power of austerity,
terms.देवप्रसादात्च: and by the grace of the gods,
terms.ब्रह्म ह श्वेताश्वतरोऽथ विद्वान्।: Brahma, the ancient one, who is wise,
terms.सम्यग ऋषि सङ्घ जुष्टम्: to the united assembly of sages.

meaning: Meaning:Due to the power of his rigorous austerity and the grace of the gods, Brahma, the ancient and wise one, addressed the assembly of highly revered hermits. He spoke words that were sacred and filled with profound wisdom.
